sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col v-for="post in posts" :key="post.id" cols="12" md="4">
          <v-card>
            <v-card-title>{{ post.title }}</v-card-title>
            <v-card-subtitle>{{ post.date }}</v-card-subtitle>
            <v-card-text>{{ post.summary }}</v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn :to="`/blog/${post.id}`" text>Read More</v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        posts: [
          { id: 1, title: 'First Blog Post', date: '2024-08-16', summary: 'This is a summary of the first blog post.' },
          { id: 2, title: 'Second Blog Post', date: '2024-08-17', summary: 'This is a summary of the second blog post.' },
          // Add more posts here
        ],
      };
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  /* Add custom styles for the blog component here */
  .v-card {
    margin-bottom: 16px;
  }
  </style>
